description: A LightningJS component for rendering detailed recipe information, including images, title, badges, ratings, ingredients, steps, nutrition info, and interactive focus controls.

classes.name: RecipeDetail
classes.description: LightningJS component for displaying detailed information about a recipe including images, metadata, ingredients, steps, and nutrition facts.

methods.name: backToList
methods.description: Navigate back to the previous list view, preserving list state.

methods.name: favToggle
methods.description: Toggle the recipe's favorite status via global store.

methods.name: toggleIngredient
methods.description: Toggle the checkbox state of a specified ingredient in the local state.

methods.description: Change focus across header buttons and sections based on delta.

methods.description: Change the selected index within ingredients or steps sections.

methods.name: isHeaderFocused
